    Cost B, the time cost.
  • uint32 m_costC
    Cost C, the time cost with possible disturbances.

Detailed Description

Contains information about the connections.

The costs to transit the connections and the allowed vehicle types are stored in this class.

uint32 RoutingConnectionData::m_costC [private]
 

Cost C, the time cost with possible disturbances.

Normally, cost B and C are equal, that is no disturbances apply to this node.
